messages.title: Antarctica
messages.text: Antarctica is the coldest, windiest, highest and driest continent on Earth! People call it "Queen of the cold". Antarctica is actually a desert 98 percent covered by a thick (2km) ice sheet. This sheet of ice is by far the largest body of fresh water and of ice on earth, comprising nearly 70 percent of the whole world's total of fresh water. People in Antarctica have to breathe through special masks as even steel becomes fragile in that cold (-89,2)
